R0031.title: Sub-Account Abuse
R0031.definition: Business account systems that have a sub-account concept but manage sub-accounts loosely, leading to account abuse.
R0031.description: Some business systems have very strict account registration requirements but are lax about sub-account creation, and sub-accounts have all the same capabilities as the parent account. Black market operators can bypass strict account registration and identity authentication policies by bulk-generating sub-accounts.
R0031.influence: Sub-account abuse bypasses account registration and identity authentication policies.
